ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Velious first impressions
ygData.msgSnippet: I just discovered something about the UI changes. I have one machine that has Velious installed on it and one that does not. My account is Velious enabled. I
ygData.messageBody:
I just discovered something about the UI changes.

I have one machine that has Velious installed on it and one that does not.
My account is Velious enabled.

I get the UI updates (i.e. Fullscrenn inventory, etc) on both machines.

So, myself and a friend did some testing:

Velious not installed, not velious enabled: No UI updates
Velious installed, not velious enabled: No UI updates
Velious not installed, velious enabled: UI updates
Velious installed, velious enabled: UI updates (Duh!)

Interesting, I guess they want to give an incentive for everyone to buy
velious.

Denidase
11th bard of Veeshan
